items.sentence: Tom sensed someone was behind him and turned to see who it was.
Tom told me that he drinks at least three cups of coffee a day.
Tom doesn\'t have enough money to pay all his bills this month.
Tom doesn\'t like it when people cuss in front of his children.
Tom doesn\'t need to explain it to me. I already understand it.
Tom isn\'t going to make you do anything you don\'t want to do.
Tom isn\'t interested in Mary and she isn\'t interested in him.
Tom isn\'t the only one who thinks we shouldn\'t be doing this.
Tom now knows that he shouldn\'t have borrowed money from Mary.
Tom thought Mary\'s dress wasn\'t appropriate for the occasion.
